title: Les Arcades d'Antananarivo
author: wheream_i
pages:
The "arcades" of
Antananarivo were
built in the center of
the city during French
occupation in the
1930's.

Madagascar was a
French colony from
1897 to 1958 and
gained independence
on June 26, 1960.
More info can be
found inside.

P.S. I took influence
from that museum in
South Africa with the
little exhibits so credit
where credit's due.
